description: tunic-like garment; dark blue; keyhole neck with button; predominately magenta embroidered flower forms made up of chevrons on front at center and front hem; three predominately magenta diamonds separated by vertical bands at lower back; gold upside-down cross element with gold charm on front below neckline; silver metal tube beads at cuffs and front hem
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic threads, metal beads, plastic charm; needlework
title: Dress
